comment: Unambiguous - SNP - correct strand, same alleles = no change
Unambiguous - SNP - correct strand, flipped alleles = flip beta
Unambiguous - SNP - incorrect strand, same alleles = no change
Unambiguous - SNP - incorrect strand, flipped alleles = flip beta
Ambiguous - SNP = discard
Unambiguous - indel - correct strand, same alleles = no change
Unambiguous - indel - correct strand, flipped alleles = flip beta
Unambiguous - indel - incorrect strand, same alleles = no change
Unambiguous - indel - incorrect strand, flipped alleles = flip beta
Ambiguous - indel = discard
Palindromic - SNP - inferrable, forward strand, same alleles = no change
Palindromic - SNP - inferrable, reverse strand, flipped alleles = flipped beta
Palindromic - SNP - inferrable, forward strand, flipped alleles = no change
Palindromic - SNP - inferrable, reverse strand, same alleles = flipped beta
Palindromic - SNP - not inferrable = discard
Multiallelic - matches unique ALT, correct ref, same alleles = no change
Multiallelic - does not matches unique ALT = discard
D,I alleles - alleles not in ATGC = discard
Position doesn't exist in reference = discard
Position has multiple lines in VCF
Palindromic, forward strand but EAF not known
Palindromic, forward strand but VCF alt AF not known
Should be dropped unless `--chrom_map 23=X` is supplied
